messages.message: Hello there! What's your general plan for this game? My inclination when I play Austria is to piss off as few people as possible, so I don't plan on making any overtly aggressive moves this turn.
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'Hello there! What's your general plan for this game? My inclination when I play Austria is to piss off as few people as possible, so I don't plan on making any overtly aggressive moves this turn.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message from AUSTRIA. Their statement about aiming to avoid being overly aggressive signals an intention to maintain peaceful relations and opens up opportunities for collaboration.

messages.message: I suggest containment of Russia at the very least and perhaps his destruction
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'I suggest containment of Russia at the very least and perhaps his destruction'.

messages.message: That certainly sounds just fine to me. I think Turkey and Austria can make for a very good alliance - you build a bunch of fleets, I build a bunch of armies, and we crush a bunch of dots.
messages.input: Message from AUSTRIA:'That certainly sounds just fine to me. I think Turkey and Austria can make for a very good alliance - you build a bunch of fleets, I build a bunch of armies, and we crush a bunch of dots.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message from AUSTRIA. Their positive response to your suggestion of containing Russia and forming a strong alliance indicates a willingness to work with you towards shared goals in the game.

messages.message: Ok lets roll I’ll go north for the opening
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'Ok lets roll I’ll go north for the opening'.

messages.message: If you want to contain Russia I am willing to support you into rum if you want to wait that’s ok too
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'If you want to contain Russia I am willing to support you into rum if you want to wait that’s ok too'.
Message from AUSTRIA:'I'd love the support, thanks.'.
messages.output: You should trust the message from AUSTRIA. Their expression of appreciation for your offer of support in Rumania reflects a positive and cooperative attitude, indicating a readiness to collaborate towards common strategic objectives.

messages.message: However nothing bad came if it and I still think we can work together your thoughts?
messages.input: My response to AUSTRIA:'However nothing bad came if it and I still think we can work together your thoughts?'.
